message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more!
You're being greedy, I'll take a bit more this time!
You're getting desperate, I'm not backing down!
You're not budging, neither am I! Let's meet in the middle!
I'm not afraid to walk away, but I'll give you a slightly better offer this time!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving in yet! I'll meet you halfway this time.
I'm not budging, take it or leave it!
You're really pushing it, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not much!
I'm taking control, you're running out of time!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not much!
This is my last offer, take it or nothing!
